mapper.select: select SUBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_NAME ,DIFFTIME,SUBJECT_COLOR from (SELECT SUBJECT_ID, SUBJECT_NAME,SUBJECT_DEL_DATE,SUBJECT_COLOR FROM SUBJECT WHERE MEM_ID =#{memId}) t1 FULL JOIN ( SELECT RECORD_SUBJECT_ID, SUBSTR(NUMTODSINTERVAL( SUM( CAST(RECORD_END as DATE) - CAST(RECORD_START as DATE) ), 'day' ), 12, 8) as DIFFTIME FROM RECORD WHERE RECORD_MEM_ID = #{memId} and to_char(RECORD_START, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd') group by cube(RECORD_SUBJECT_ID) ) t2 on (SUBJECT_ID = RECORD_SUBJECT_ID) WHERE SUBJECT_DEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY SUBJECT_ID ASC NULLS FIRST

select SUBJECT_NAME , (select SUBJECT_COLOR from subject where SUBJECT.SUBJECT_NAME = V_RECORD.SUBJECT_NAME ) as "COLOR" , SUBSTR(DIFFTIME,12,8) DIFFTIME, SUBSTR(RECORD_DATE,7,2) as ONLY_DATE from V_RECORD where RECORD_MEM_ID =#{memId} and TRUNC(RECORD_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

select t1.SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJECT_COLOR "COLOR", TO_CHAR(DDAY,'MM-DD') ONLY_DATE, NVL(DIFFTIME, 0) DIFFTIME from (select * from (select SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJECT_COLOR from subject where mem_id=#{memId}) t1 cross join v_dday4 ) t1 left join (select SUBJECT_NAME, RECORD_DATE, DIFFTIME from V_RECORD_SEC where RECORD_MEM_ID = #{memId}) t2 on t1.SUBJECT_NAME = t2.SUBJECT_NAME and DDAY = TRUNC(t2.RECORD_DATE) order by t1.subject_name ASC, DDAY ASC

select NVL(ROUND(DIFFTIME), 0) DIFFTIME, TO_CHAR(DDAY,'MM-DD') ONLY_DATE from V_DDAY30 left join (select TRUNC(record_date) RDAY, sum(DIFFTIME) DIFFTIME from V_RECORD_SEC where RECORD_MEM_ID= #{memId} group by TRUNC(record_date)) on DDAY = RDAY order by DDAY ASC

select t1.SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJECT_COLOR "COLOR", TO_CHAR(DDAY,'MM-DD') ONLY_DATE, NVL(ROUND(DIFFTIME), 0) DIFFTIME from (select * from (select SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJECT_COLOR from subject where mem_id= #{memId}) t1 cross join v_dday30 ) t1 left join (select SUBJECT_NAME, RECORD_DATE, DIFFTIME from V_RECORD_SEC where RECORD_MEM_ID = #{memId}) t2 on t1.SUBJECT_NAME = t2.SUBJECT_NAME and DDAY = TRUNC(t2.RECORD_DATE) order by t1.subject_name ASC, ONLY_DATE ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(DDAY,'MM-DD') AS ONLY_DATE, SUM(NVL(ROUND(DIFFTIME), 0)) OVER (ORDER BY DDAY ASC ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS DIFFTIME FROM V_DDAY30 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TRUNC(record_date) AS RDAY, SUM(DIFFTIME) AS DIFFTIME FROM V_RECORD_SEC WHERE RECORD_MEM_ID = #{memId} GROUP BY TRUNC(record_date) ) ON DDAY = RDAY ORDER BY DDAY ASC

select TO_CHAR(MMONTH,'mm') ONLY_DATE, NVL(DIFFTIME, 0) DIFFTIME from V_MMONTH12 left join (select to_char(record_date,'yy-mm') RDAY, round(sum(DIFFTIME),0) DIFFTIME from V_RECORD_SEC where RECORD_MEM_ID= #{memId} group by to_char(record_date,'yy-mm')) on TO_CHAR(MMONTH,'yy-mm') = RDAY order by MMONTH

select t1.SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJECT_COLOR "COLOR", TO_CHAR(mmonth,'mm') ONLY_DATE, NVL(ROUND(DIFFTIME), 0) DIFFTIME from (select * from (select SUBJECT_NAME, SUBJECT_COLOR from subject where mem_id= #{memId}) t1 cross join V_MMONTH12 ) t1 left join (select SUBJECT_NAME, to_char((RECORD_DATE),'yy-mm') as RDAY, round(sum(DIFFTIME),0) DIFFTIME from V_RECORD_SEC where RECORD_MEM_ID = #{memId} group by SUBJECT_NAME, to_char((RECORD_DATE),'yy-mm') order by rday) t2 on t1.SUBJECT_NAME = t2.SUBJECT_NAME and TO_CHAR( t1.MMONTH,'yy-mm') = RDAY order by t1.subject_name ASC, mmonth ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE RECORD SET RECORD_END = to_date(#{recordStart}, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') where RECORD_SUBJECT_ID =#{recordSubjectId} and RECORD_MEM_ID=#{recordMemId} and RECORD_END IS NULL
mapper.select: select SUBJECT_NAME, RECORD_START , RECORD_END ,SUBJECT_COLOR from record join SUBJECT on RECORD_SUBJECT_ID=SUBJECT_ID WHERE RECORD_MEM_ID= #{memId} order by RECORD_START
